name: hydrocortisone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a hormone (= a chemical made by living cells) or a drug made from this, used for treating skin conditions, insect bites, and inflammation (= painful swelling in part of the body): The doctor prescribed hydrocortisone cream for her eczema. The amount of steroid in hydrocortisone is tiny, and it is an effective way of treating allergic rashes. Compare
cortisone
More examplesFewer examplesOver-the-counter hydrocortisone cream can help on localized itchy areas.Hydrocortisone is an anti-inflammatory drug that mimics the natural hormone cortisol, which is known as the stress hormone.Apply ice for five minutes to reduce the swelling, then slather the area with hydrocortisone.Hydrocortisone injections into the joint are an option but rarely work.
